About · Academics · Outreach · Professional · Contact

About us

We are the Mathematics Undergraduate Student Association of the University of California, Berkeley!

We strive to improve the overall quality of studying mathematics here as an undergraduate, especially by advocating for issues that benefit the entire undergraduate math community, not only the subset that attends our events.

Joining MUSA is an excellent way to connect with other math enthusiasts. You can learn about the many opportunities for math students, including little tricks that will help you survive the rigorous math curriculum here.

MUSA is independent of the University of California, and is managed by our team of officers.

Our office

Our office at 938 Evans Hall is open Monday through Friday from 11am to 5pm.

Oh, we also provide very important services such as selling cheap food and Berkeley Mathematics apparel. You can see who's in the office and what food we have at our office hours page.

Weekly Events

We hold events every week throughout the semester. Typically, our events are held at 6pm-8pm at Evans 1015, the top floor lounge of Evans Hall. Our upcoming events are listed on the right. To see the full list of events, see our Google calendar or the mailing list archive below.

Academic Events

We are committed to improving the academic standing of undergraduate math community at Berkeley, especially by filling in where the department does not cover. Some of our academic events are:

  • REU (Research Experience for Undergraduates) Panels;
  • DRP (Directed Reading Program) Mixers;
  • Graduate School Panels;
  • and themed Recreational Math Nights.

Above all, we are proud of our flagship event: Math Monday Undergraduate Lecture Series. Math Monday talks are a series of lectures about various topics of research in math and applied math directed at undergraduate math students.

Math Monday Schedule

Professional Events

We occasionally hold events such as alumni panels and internship panels.
Joining MUSA also connects you to our extensive alumni network. To join our alumni mailing list, please email us.

Outreach

MUSA's outreach team is responsible for holding events that not only improve the quality of life for undergraduates here in the math department, but also prospective students and math enthusiasts in the general public.

Contact

Have any questions? Email us at musa@math.berkeley.edu or visit our office at 938 Evans Hall (see a map in the about section above).

musa@math.berkeley.edu facebook

Our primary method of communication is through weekly emails in our mailing list at musa@lists.berkeley.edu. To subscribe visit here.

Wanna send us a message?




MUSA is a Registered Student Organization acting independently of the University of California.
We take full responsibility for our organization and this web site.
